english.segment1: When trouble is in my way. I can't tell my night from day. When I'm tossed from side to side. Like a ship on a raging tide. I don't worry I don't fret. My God has never failed me yet. Troubles come from time to time. But that's all right, I'm not the worrying kind because
english.segment2: Chorus: I've got confidence. God is gonna see me through. No matter what the case may be. I know He's gonna fix it for me
english.segment3: Job was sick so long. Till the flesh fell from his bones. His wife, cattle and children, Everything that he had was gone. Find More lyrics at www.sweetslyrics.com. But Job in he despair. I said He knew that God still cared. Sleepless days and sleepless nights. But Job said that's all right because
english.segment5: Some folks wonder how I smile. Even when I'm goin' through trials. They say Andrae` how can you have song. When everything is goin' wrong. But I don't worry I don't fret. My God has never failed me yet. Trouble's coming from time to time. But that's all right, I'm not the worrying kind because.
